description:
Have you ever wanted to create your own affiliate website but didn’t have a clue of where to start? If so, then you’ve come to the right place because in this course I will teach you how to set up your own affiliate site and start earning money in less than a day!

This course is designed to help you jump into the world of affiliate by applying the simple components available. First, you are going to learn how to pick the ideal domain for your specific needs.

Next, I am going to show you how to install Wordpress in just a few minute by using the automatic script that most of the todays webhosts offer. When we are done with the Wordpress installation I am going to show you how to add posts and pages plus explain the difference between them.

When we are done with posts and pages we are going to jump straight on the social media presence where I will explain why this is a crucial part of your site’s success. Further, we are going to select the ideal theme for your site and I will show you why having a responsive theme (mobile friendly) is a must today!

I am also going to explain how you can back up your whole site without needing to risk losing all of your data. After you backup your site, I am going to discuss the on page SEO which is really important as it will decide whether you will have a lot of visitors to your site, or only few.

Simply put, get it wrong and you will be buried in the search engines, however, I will show you a simple way to get this done immediately with minimal efforts. I am also going to touch briefly on security in Wordpress.

The last section discusses the different affiliate programs including their pros and cons which is going to make your life much easier when the time is come to pick the ideal affiliate offer that you want to promote on your site.

I want to emphasize on that over 90% of the lectures are in video format, you will be able to watch over my shoulder as I teach you all the tools needed to create a great looking affiliate site in less than a day!

When this course is over you will have a great looking affiliate website that is ready for the world and immediately be able to start earning commissions by promoting the offers available for your niche!
title: How to Create a Wordpress Affiliate Site in 24 Hours or Less
